title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python applications with async support and streaming.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node.js and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with additional helpers for model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to Ollama with Markdown rendering and chat history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with CUDA/ROCm.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to an Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app demonstrating RAG with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that routes user queries to local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients like Claude Desktop.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Bolt framework that lets teams query Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run model-based tests.
